page.title: 20LIFE STYLES - cont'd
page.content: to the farm to play. My Dad shouted me to go and have my dinner, after dinner I went to Julie's again and Shaun was there, so all three of us went in the silage and played in it. Dad shouted me I went to hime and we went home to Mark and Mum. Dad and I stayed at home. Mark was playing with his tractor. I made a drink for me, Mum & Dad. We had tea, we had meat, carrots, potatoes & peas, it was nice. Then we had ice-cream & jelly. Then Mark & I put our pyjamas on, we had a wash and cleaned our teeth and then we went to bed and I said :- 'Good night, Sleep tight, Wake up bright, In the morning light'.
